name: Cookie Fries
description: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Shaped Like Fries
instructions: Melt 1 stick of butter in a pan until it browns, then set aside to cool slightly
Mix the brown butter with brown sugar and regular sugar
Add baking powder and a little over 1 cup of flour
Using a wooden spoon, gently fold the ingredients together - do not overmix
Add chocolate chips and fold them in
Place the dough on the cookie sheet and shape into a rectangle
Cut the dough into strips to create 'fries' shapes
Remove from freezer, separate the cookie strips, and place them back on the sheet
Bake for about 13 minutes until golden
Serve with hazelnut spread for dipping
